channel.title: [525] Weapon Help
channel.description:
Okay so I have this 525 source that I'm helping a friend code and I'm trying to add Morrigan Javelin special attack and make the javelins stackable and wieldable. I'm sorry to say I have no clue what the base is. Please anyone help x) Just give me a general idea of where to start. I've looked at numerous tutorials and none seem to relate the source I have.
Please atleast reply to what you think is going on. Don't just read the topic and leave..

item.title: [525] Weapon Help
item.dc:creator: @Eyedea Eyedea
item.description:
@Eyedea wrote:

Yes I discovered that with NotePad++ thanks all that I need help with now is making the javelins wieldable and adding a special bar to the attack style tab when wielding the javelins. Any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: [525] Weapon Help
item.dc:creator: @skulledace22 skulledace22
item.description:
@skulledace22 wrote:

If it is correct :data-items-stackable and u can add it in there,or look in source file.
